questions.questionText: 1.In Unix, which system call creates the new process?
questions.explanation: TS uses a colon (:) to separate the property name from the property type

questions.questionText: 2.Which of the following is not a core data type in Python programming?
questions.explanation: enum is not used as a type in TypeScript

questions.questionText: 3.Which of the following is a type of polymorphism in Java Programming?
questions.explanation: interfaces are typically used to list the properties and methods for an object

questions.questionText: 4.The processes that are residing in main memory and are ready and waiting to execute are kept on a list called _____________
questions.explanation: number[] is another way of writing Array<number> in TypeScript

questions.questionText: 5.Which network topology requires a central controller or hub?
questions.explanation: a constructor is used by a class to take in parameters

questions.questionText: 6.What is the full form of DBMS?
questions.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in TypeScript

questions.questionText: 7.Which of the following are transport layer protocols used in networking?
questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

questions.questionText: 8.Which of these is a process of extracting/removing the state of an object from a stream?
questions.explanation: filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array

questions.questionText: 9.What is it called if an object has its own lifecycle and there is no owner?
questions.explanation: this.propertyName is the way to access a specific property within a class

questions.questionText: 10.Which of the following is the multiple access protocol for channel access control?
questions.explanation: this.propertyName is the way to access a specific property within a class
